CompleterDirModel Class Reference
[Visual Components used by XINX]

Class used by DirectoryEdit to complete on path. Completer model class based on a QDirModel which permit to propose a completion on the path. The QDir model convert the slash on native separtor. If the path end with a separator, the separator is deleted. More...

#include <directoryedit.h>

List of all members.

 CompleterDirModel (QObject *parent=0)
QVariant data (const QModelIndex &index, int role=Qt::DisplayRole) const

Detailed Description

Class used by DirectoryEdit to complete on path. Completer model class based on a QDirModel which permit to propose a completion on the path. The QDir model convert the slash on native separtor. If the path end with a separator, the separator is deleted.

Member Function Documentation

QVariant CompleterDirModel::data ( const QModelIndex &  index,
int  role = Qt::DisplayRole 
) const

Return the data to change in the completion dir model. This model show the good separator (with the QDir::toNativeSepartors() function).

Parameters:
index The model index, represents a path in the tree.
role Only the role Qt::DisplayRole is modified in this object.
